pages.text: The windmill will ganerate a resonable amounts of power in the early game progress, you can use multiple windmill to produce more power. But first you need a Kinetic Dynamo
This block will take power from windmill and waterwheel from all side, except the face with a dark circle, that's face is where u attach the windmill on
Before you can craft the windmill, u need 8 Windmill Blades and a iron ingot
After u craft this make suere to put it on a high place (At least 4 block high) and have to attach with the Kinetic Dynamo.

Not Enough Power for the machine ? So let's upgrade you windmill with Windmill Sails. The sails can be attach on the windmill by holding the sail and right click on the wind mill. You can use 8 sails on a windmill
